Topic Summary: IT and VAT assessments raised following audit of a business comprised of the sale of goods such as fertilizer, coal, agricultural feed, and haulage of sheep and cattle.
Tax Legislation: Section 18, Schedule D,  Section 65, Section 81, Section 959Y, Section 959AA, Section 886 Taxes Consolidation Act 1997, Section 84, Section 111 of the Value-Added Tax Consolidation Act 2010
